items.title: GitHub
items.description: GitHub acts as our authentication provider, software repository, markdown parser engine and general service provider for the issue tracker infrastructures.

items.title: Transifex
items.description: The Issue Tracker utilizes Transifex to manage translations of the user interface. If you would like to help translating, please head over to the [project page on Transifex](https://opentranslators.transifex.com/projects/p/jtracker/translate).
